description:
Section 73 application for the variation of condition 2 (drawings) of planning permission ref: P111627 granted at appeal (ref: APP/V5570/A/12/2173278) for the redevelopment of the site including and to the rear of Nos. 23 and 27 Newington Green Road; demolition of existing buildings on the site and erection of 5 family dwellings to the rear of the site ( 4 x 4 bed & 1 x 3 bed dwellings)  and erection of 2 x four storey buildings  fronting onto Newington Green Road to create 4 self contained units ( 3 x 2 beds & 1 x 1 bed)  and associated landscaping and refuse and bike facilities, dated 22/08/2012.

Amendments to south elevation are:
- New rendered screens to match main building (Dwg 12_101-310)
- Building up of flat roof to rear of No. 1 Bingham Street so that flat roof aligns (Dwg No. 12_101-310);

Amendments to west elevation are:
- Alterations to window arrangement including removal of large glazed area to stair link and installation of obscurely glazed window (Dwg 12_101-311);
-Installation of acoustic screen (Dwg 12_101-311).
